item.title: A Most Beautiful Woman
item.description: Archived from the original article here ğŸŒ¼ Featured in the Atlantic This article appeared in Issue #2 of the Atlantic Bulletin. You can read it here. When Tzipora first laid eyes on Ayn, hours after her arrival in the country, she thought, â€œthatâ€™s the most beautiful woman Iâ€™ve ever seen.â€ It wasnâ€™t just her features or figure that captured Tziporaâ€™s attention â€” it was also her confident, inconspicuous movements and a quiet self-assuredness that seemed obvious in her gentle expression and posture.
